blog.name: shelbyroundthemountain
blog.title: Pod save my soul
blog.description: Shelby, She/Her, Libra, INFP. I enjoy podcasts and petting my cat Clifford. I post a lot of meta about Critical Role and other podcasts. I also have been trying to blog more about my personal experience and mental health, but I understand that's not what everyone wants on their dash so anything too serious will be tagged BUMMER ZONE. I also try my best to tag triggers but I can't make any promises.I encourage you to message to talk about ANYTHING you see here. I don't have nearly enough people to chat with.

summary: Sending out the call
title: Sending out the call
body: Hello! I’m looking for some people that I can DM for. I really I just want to DM for people with a passion for character and story. If you’re interested, message me or like this post and I’ll message you with the Discord and more info.

reblog.comment: Hello! I’m looking for some people that I can DM for. I really I just want to DM for people with a passion for character and story. If you’re interested, message me or like this post and I’ll message you with the Discord and more info.

summary: Hey we don’t know how old Baby Breau is right? This started with kids from the Empire being abducted by people from Xhorhas...
body: Hey we don’t know how old Baby Breau is right? This started with kids from the Empire being abducted by people from Xhorhas allegedly. With the Xhorhasian army drawing near where they live if B.B. is still a kid there’s always the chance that he has been taken :,))))

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: I do believe Travis was telling the truth when he said Fjord loves Nott, he just doesn’t really understand her and honestly...
body: I do believe Travis was telling the truth when he said Fjord loves Nott, he just doesn’t really understand her and honestly didn’t know the joking was actually bothering her. I’m hoping they can mend their relationship soon, especially since we look to be moving into a Nott arc soon. I want Fjord to stick up for her in a bad situation or help her in battle, show her that he might be a big dummy sometimes but he does care about her.

reblog.comment: I do believe Travis was telling the truth when he said Fjord loves Nott, he just doesn’t really understand her and honestly didn’t know the joking was actually bothering her. I’m hoping they can mend their relationship soon, especially since we look to be moving into a Nott arc soon. I want Fjord to stick up for her in a bad situation or help her in battle, show her that he might be a big dummy sometimes but he does care about her.

trail.content_raw: I do believe Travis was telling the truth when he said Fjord loves Nott, he just doesn’t really understand her and honestly didn’t know the joking was actually bothering her. I’m hoping they can mend their relationship soon, especially since we look to be moving into a Nott arc soon. I want Fjord to stick up for her in a bad situation or help her in battle, show her that he might be a big dummy sometimes but he does care about her.
trail.content: I do believe Travis was telling the truth when he said Fjord loves Nott, he just doesn’t really understand her and honestly didn’t know the joking was actually bothering her. I’m hoping they can mend their relationship soon, especially since we look to be moving into a Nott arc soon. I want Fjord to stick up for her in a bad situation or help her in battle, show her that he might be a big dummy sometimes but he does care about her.

summary: Anyways Beauregard "I've never been shown love or affection in my life" Lionett and Yasha "I keep losing the people I love and...

summary:
Nott: Have him home by eleven.
Caleb: Mom, you're embarrassing me!
Nott: Now say good night to your father.
Frumpkin: (walks in...
body:
Nott: Have him home by eleven.

Caleb: Mom, you’re embarrassing me!

Nott: Now say good night to your father.

Frumpkin: (walks in wearing a little bow tie)

Fjord: Good night, sir.

summary: I wanted some practice with expressions and with making cleaner lines, so I decided, why not draw the nein [id: two rows of...
caption:
I wanted some practice with expressions and with making cleaner lines, so I decided, why not draw the nein

[id: two rows of digitally drawn faces in black on a white background, four in each row. top row, from left to right: fjord, looking thoughtfully to the side; beau, frowning with her lip curled up; caleb, frowning and looking down; molly, smiling slightly. bottom row, from left to right: nott, smiling widely; jester, baring her teeth; caduceus, looking concerned; yasha, sighing with her eyes closed. end id]

reblog.comment:
I wanted some practice with expressions and with making cleaner lines, so I decided, why not draw the nein

[id: two rows of digitally drawn faces in black on a white background, four in each row. top row, from left to right: fjord, looking thoughtfully to the side; beau, frowning with her lip curled up; caleb, frowning and looking down; molly, smiling slightly. bottom row, from left to right: nott, smiling widely; jester, baring her teeth; caduceus, looking concerned; yasha, sighing with her eyes closed. end id]

trail.content_raw:
I wanted some practice with expressions and with making cleaner lines, so I decided, why not draw the nein

[id: two rows of digitally drawn faces in black on a white background, four in each row. top row, from left to right: fjord, looking thoughtfully to the side; beau, frowning with her lip curled up; caleb, frowning and looking down; molly, smiling slightly. bottom row, from left to right: nott, smiling widely; jester, baring her teeth; caduceus, looking concerned; yasha, sighing with her eyes closed. end id]

summary: Don’t forget that Taliesin Jaffe played not only Caduceus “I wonder what Vandren is doing” Clay but ALSO Percy “I want to use...
body: Don’t forget that Taliesin Jaffe played not only Caduceus “I wonder what Vandren is doing” Clay but ALSO Percy “I want to use the scrying eye on Scanlan” DeRolo, this bitch has been nosy and sneaky as hell from the start but god dammit do we love him
